Data:
Hey! Welcome to this little game specially prepared for you =) 
 (Tap to continue)

First, allow me to explain how to play. 
 (Tap to continue)

You'll find little pictures hiding all over the place. 
 (Tap to continue)

Use your camera to scan them and you'll be able to get a ... clue! 
 (Tap to continue)

Think hard to find out the next location.... A surprise is waiting for you! 
 (Tap to continue)

Without any delay... Let's begin the game... 
 (Tap to continue)

Ah! I almost forgot.... here is the first clue: 
 (Tap to continue)
